The article states that many people had stopped wearing masks (translated by Google Translate): "Since the lifting of the health emergency, most of the inhabitants of the capital and its surroundings have thrown barrier gestures into oblivion. For the first three weeks of the new rule, police will remind residents to wear their mask; on the fourth week and thereafter, General Ravelonarivo is quoted as saying (translated by Google Translate): " 'those who transgress the sanitary rules will be sanctioned.'"
